alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 6:32PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Itawamba and central Lee Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 632 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tupelo, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Fulton, Verona, Tombigbee State Park, Saltillo, Plantersville, Mantachie, Beech Springs, Skyline, Abney, Mooreville, Eggville, Ballardsville, Frog Island, Unity, Indian Hills, Dorsey, Flowerdale and Richmond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
